page.title: 05The Population of Bramdean
page.content: The total population is 402 persons, of which approximately 18% are children under 16. Approximately 15% of the adults are retired, 53% work full time outside the home, (this number is almost equally divided between those who work in the village and those who travel outside the area). Approximately 0.5% of adults are unemployed. Approximately 32% of adults work in the home or are students, a small proportion of those working in the home also have part time jobs. The percentage of people working away from the village do so mainly within a radius of 10 miles, a very small proportion commute further afield.
